titleStmt.title: Love in a bush: or, The two loyal lovers joy ccmpleated [sic]. She seem'd to slight her hearts delight, which caus'd him to complain: but when she see his loyalty, she made him glad again. Tune of, Oh so ungrateful a creature. This may be printed. R.P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for James Bissel at the Bible and Harp in West Smithfield.,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and date suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.
